channel.title: Bankai Question...
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bankai Question..."

item.title: Re: Bankai Question...
item.content:encoded:
I haven't seen an item that would reduce levels. Stamina, yes, but not levels. Losing levels form the Sword of the Reaper is a function of the mission, not the item. If you get the item another way (which, to my knowledge, is no longer possible) you don't lose levels.

To answer the question, bonuses from items do not alter your base stats for purposes of looping. Feel free to activate Bankai in relative safety.

item.title: Re: Bankai Question...
item.content:encoded: They give or take the 'added' levels, not the 'base' levels … except for something like when you get the Sword of the Reaper and have to give up 2 levels permanently.

item.title: Re: Bankai Question...
item.content:encoded:
It would be 16 all +5 bonus.

No item gives you levels (though some give you XP, and some can take away levels).
